header.title: Users
header.description: View and manage users in this organization.

empty.title: No users yet
empty.description: Users in this organization will appear here.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.reactivateSubscriptionDescription: The subscription will be reactivated and will continue as usual.
subscription.reactivateAnytime: You can reactivate the subscription at any time.
subscription.cancelSubscriptionDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel this subscription? This action cannot be undone.
subscription.createErrorTooManyUsedSeats: Too many users are already invited to this organization. Create a subscription with more seats.

licenseSeats.title: License Seats
licenseSeats.manageLicenseSeatsDescription: Adjust the number of license seats for this organization.

billingInfo.title: Billing Information
billingInfo.updateBillingInfoDescription: Update the billing details and payment information.

subscriptionDialog.title: Create Subscription
subscriptionDialog.description: Please provide the company details to set up the subscription for this organization.
subscriptionDialog.noOfSeatsDescription: You can change the number of seats at any time.

trialDialog.title: Create Trial
trialDialog.description: Define the maximum number of messages available for this organization's trial.
trialDialog.maxMessagesDescription: You can adjust the allowance at any time.

trialUpdateDialog.title: Update Trial
trialUpdateDialog.description: Adjust the trial allowance or reset the current usage.
trialUpdateDialog.maxMessagesDescription: Increase or decrease how many messages the trial can use.
trialUpdateDialog.messagesSentDescription: Use this to reset or correct the current usage.

deleteUser.error: Failed to delete user. Please try again.

confirmDelete.title: Delete User
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.

triggerPasswordReset.error: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.

confirmPasswordReset.title: Send Password Reset Email
confirmPasswordReset.description: Send a password reset email to {{name}} ({{email}})?

createUser.title: Create New User
createUser.description: Create a new user in this organization. A random password will be generated and a password reset email can optionally be sent to the user.
createUser.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
createUser.sendPasswordResetEmailLabel: Send password reset email to user
createUser.error: Failed to create user. Please try again.
createUser.emailProviderBlacklisted: This email provider is not allowed.
createUser.userAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists.

noSubscription.title: No subscription yet
noSubscription.description: This organization has no subscription yet.

trial.title: Trial Information
trial.createErrorMaxMessagesRequired: Maximum number of messages is required
trial.createErrorAlreadyExists: A trial for this organization already exists
trial.createErrorCapacityExceeded: Max messages exceed the allowed limit
trial.updateErrorMaxMessagesRequired: Maximum number of messages is required
trial.updateErrorCapacityExceeded: Max messages exceed the allowed limit

noTrial.title: No trial found
noTrial.description: This organization does not have an active trial.
